docs.title: Documentation
docs.text:
Welcome to 🆚VR, the Ultimate VR Room Sharing Platform

Imagine a world where you can play, create, and share immersive VR experiences with friends and like-minded individuals from around the globe. 🆚VR makes this vision a reality, providing a platform for users to access, modify, and share VR rooms in a seamless and intuitive way.

docs.title: Get Started
docs.text:
Learn how to navigate our 3D space and start building your own VR rooms with our Getting Started guide.

Discover our expanding Flow Graph - a Node System, designed to help you create complex and engaging experiences.

docs.title: Features
docs.text:
Browse and play Shared Quests created by players.

Contribute to the platform and share your own creations with others.

Upvote your favorite levels and help shape the future of VR room sharing.

docs.title: Documentation
docs.text:
Explore our comprehensive documentation, covering everything from controls to building and sharing rooms.

Stay up-to-date with our Changelog, highlighting the latest features and updates.

docs.title: Building and sharing
docs.text:
Use left menu on 🆚VR to create primitives.

When another user is connected to the room, he will see object movements realtime.

docs.title: Navigate around using mouse and keyboard:
docs.text: Button Left Click rotate camera Shift + Left Click pan camera Right Click select objects 1️⃣ Tranform object 2️⃣ Rotate object 3️⃣ Scale object -- --

docs.title: Node System
docs.text: The nodes are based on threlte-flow collection which use Svelte Flow.

docs.title: List of nodes
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: Shared quests
docs.text:
Shared spaces can be added through discussions

This page does update with intervals, to get the latest spaces navigate to dicussions.

docs.title: Starting a new room
docs.text: When 🆚VR opened, the upper middle bar will have a code which can be shared with a friend to connect.
